name: places/ChIJT51Yo5z2wokRfi6paOI4RHQ
formattedAddress: 3928 Broadway 1st floor, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 3928 Broadway 1st floor, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: If I can give this place negative stars I would rate this place 10000000 negative stars. The staff if unprofessional. The dentist, dentist assistants and front desks people don’t care about your personal time, if you have an Appointment at 9am you’ll most likely be seen at 11:30-12pm. They over book the day knowing they’ll have people waiting for hours in a small office. I had an issue with the service I received today and the assistant cursed me out threatening me all because I was speaking facts on how they run this place. It should be shut down. This place sucks!

originalText.text: This is by far the worst dentist office. Dr. Merianne Mofetas is the worst dentist for kids. Never take your kids here. She totally traumatized my daughter. Took out my daughters first tooth cold blooded. My daughter screamed so loud the whole dental office heard her. Then she decided to use anesthesia after she notice my daughter was in so much pain. Her explanation was she doesn’t like to use anesthesia on kids. Like are you crazy lady. Besides the fact that we lasted 3 hrs to be seen. This place is horrible. HORRIBLE never bring your kids here.

originalText.text: My appointment was at 1:30 and it’s 4:20 and I stilll haven’t been seen. Never coming back here

text.text: My appointment was at 1:30 and it’s 4:20 and I stilll haven’t been seen. Never coming back here

originalText.text: This place is horrible. I went for a check up appointment (which I made a month prior to the date) when i arrived at 10:40am for my 11am appointment the place was full. I wasn’t seen since 10:40 till 2pm and ONLY X-rays. I had to wait again for doctor another 2 hours. The front desk people explained repeatedly they see emergencies first, so my question is what’s the point of the appointment? Will never be coming here again!

originalText.text: Will be reporting this place they called to confirm my appointment on Friday my appointment was today and they wait till I get all the way over there to tell me I have to reschedule my appointment, and the Spanish girl is also rude and has a nasty attitude
